description:
The [Traditional Series] Equipment Set brings awesome traditional weapons, bracelets, and accessories to Neptune and the gang!

The [Traditional Series] Equipment Set includes:

Weapons
• Traditional Sword: Neptune
• Traditional Blade: Noire
• Traditional Axe: Blanc
• Traditional Spear: Vert
• Traditional Cards: Chrome

Bracelets
• Traditional Gloves: All characters
• Traditional Bracelet: Neptune, Vert, Artisan, IF
• Traditional Gauntlet: Neptune, Vert, Artisan, IF
• Traditional Armlet: Noire, Blanc, Chrome, Compa
• Traditional Wristband: Noire, Blanc, Chrome, Compa

Accessories
• Traditional Earrings: Neptune
• Traditional Crown: Noire
• Traditional Scarf: Blanc
• Traditional Necklace: Vert
• Traditional Belt: Chrome

*Note: The Weapons are visible on the characters in battle, but the Bracelets and Accessories are not.
name: [Traditional Series] Equipment Set
